title: Zesty Lime Shrimp and Avocado Salad
directions: In a small bowl combine red onion, lime juice, olive oil, salt and pepper. Let them marinate at least 5 minutes to mellow the flavor of the onion.
In a large bowl combine chopped shrimp, avocado, tomato, jalape√±o.
Combine all the ingredients together, add cilantro and gently toss. Adjust salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: 1/4 tsp kosher salt, black pepper to taste
1 lb jumbo cooked, peeled shrimp, chopped*
